title: Chocolate Cake with Caramel Sauce
directions: Combine coconut flour, cacao powder, eggs, coconut oil, maple syrup and baking soda in a bowl and mix well. Pour mixture (it is quite runny) into a round cake tin. Bake in a moderate oven for 40 minutes. Meanwhile, make the caramel sauce by combining the dates and coconut milk at high speed in your blender. Once the cake is cool, top with the caramel sauce and serve.
